about_the_game:
Compete with friends or players from around the globe using some of the world's deadliest modern weapons and vehicles. Play in unique arenas designed for infantry, vehicle, and air combat.

Game Modes:
- Team Deathmatch
- Territories
- Free For All
- Search and Destroy (TBA)
- King of the Hill (TBA)
- Capture the Flag (TBA)
- Battle Royale (TBA)

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore

detailed_description:
Compete with friends or players from around the globe using some of the world's deadliest modern weapons and vehicles. Play in unique arenas designed for infantry, vehicle, and air combat.

Game Modes:
- Team Deathmatch
- Territories
- Free For All
- Search and Destroy (TBA)
- King of the Hill (TBA)
- Capture the Flag (TBA)
- Battle Royale (TBA)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS X Lion (10.7)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel® Core™ i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Integrated Graphics or Apple M1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS X Ventura (13)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel® Core™ i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: War Trigger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Destroy, smash and blast your way to victory! Use advanced weapons and vehicles to dominate the battlefield.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
